mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn,b.no no,name,hit,reg_date regDate,title,user_no userNo from replyboards b,users r where b.user_no=r.no order by b.no desc) where rn<=#{endNum} and rn>#{startNum}
select count(*) from (select * from replyboards b, users r where b.user_no=r.no) where title like #{name} or name like #{name}

select * from (select rownum rn,no,name,hit,regDate,title,userNo from (select b.no no,name,hit,reg_date regDate,title,user_no userNo from replyboards b, users r where b.user_no=r.no) where title like #{name} or name like #{name}) where rn<=#{endNum} and rn>#{startNum} order by rn desc
